sections.text: The MPP program at Harris School of Public Policy trains leaders in evidence-based policy analysis and decision-making.

items: Core in economics, statistics, and decision-making
sections.text: Students complete rigorous core courses and electives, with practical policy labs and leadership development.
Applicants must demonstrate quantitative readiness; admission requires a completed application and review.
Graduates pursue careers in government, NGOs, and international organizations as policy analysts and leaders.
